metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6176 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - high.
metadata.Description: A null pointer dereference flaw was found in the Linux kernel API for the cryptographic algorithm scatterwalk functionality. This issue occurs when a user constructs a malicious packet with specific socket configuration, which could allow a local user to crash the system or escalate their privileges on the system.

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
